description.english: Survive for 5 minutes without destroying any enemies in the endless game mode on easy difficulty.
Reach power level 1000 in the waves game mode on easy difficulty.
Destroy 20 enemies with a single power up in the special spawn game mode on easy difficulty.
Have 5 bosses alive at the same time in the boss battle game mode on easy difficulty.
Survive for 15 minutes without upgrading the auto upgrade in the auto action game mode on easy difficulty.
Hit the same enemy 4 times with the blast ability in the hordes game mode on easy difficulty.
Survive for 10 minutes without upgrading your tank in the endless game mode on medium difficulty.
Survive for 10 waves without shooting any bullets in the waves game mode on medium difficulty. (Auto upgrade is allowed)
Destroy 21 enemies within the first 60 seconds of the game in the slide assault game mode on medium difficulty.
Complete 15 objectives in under 15 minutes in the quest hunt game mode on medium difficulty.
Survive for the first 10 minutes of the game without moving in the apocalypse game mode on medium difficulty.
Defeat a boss with a power up using the assault class while the ghost ability is active in any game mode on medium difficulty.
Complete 4 objectives in a row in the endless game mode on hard difficulty.
Defeat the first boss without upgrading your tank in the waves game mode on hard difficulty.

displayName.english: That's A Lot Of Power Ups

description.english: Collect 70 power ups in a single game in the power master game mode on hard difficulty.
Max out the double shot and fire rate upgrades using the shotgun class in the infinite blast game mode on hard difficulty.
Survive for 10 minutes without taking damage in the hardcore game mode on hard difficulty.
Use the dash ability 40 times in a single game in the drift king game mode on hard difficulty.
Survive for 5 minutes without upgrading your tank or using an ability in the endless game mode on extreme difficulty.
Complete the first 20 waves without failing an objective in the waves game mode on extreme difficulty.
Destroy 500 enemies in a single game using the sniper class in the one shot game mode on extreme difficulty.
Travel 4km in a single game in the black out game mode on extreme difficulty.
Survive for 10 minutes without upgrading the speed upgrade in the rapid rush game mode on extreme difficulty.
Destroy 150 enemies with the nuke ability in a single game in the warzone game mode on extreme difficulty.
Survive for 5 minutes and defeat the first boss without taking any damage in the endless game mode on impossible difficulty.
Acquire a tier 5 upgrade in the waves game mode on impossible difficulty.
Destroy 100 enemies without upgrading your tank in the beefy boys game mode on impossible difficulty.
Max out the speed upgrade in the super speed game mode on impossible difficulty.
Survive for 5 minutes without using an ability in the empty barrel game mode on impossible difficulty.
Hit 50 enemies at once with the freeze ability in the swarm game mode on impossible difficulty.
Defeat the final boss in the waves game mode.
Complete the same adventure stage twice.
Collect the green badge for all 5 difficulties on a map in the endless game mode.
Collect the green badge for all 5 difficulties in a challenge game mode.
Complete an adventure stage without shooting any bullets. (Auto upgrade is allowed)
Complete an adventure stage without moving.
Max out 5 upgrades in a single game of the fast forward game mode.
Play on all 5 mini maps in the mini map game mode.
Destroy Frank.
Defeat 3 bosses in a single game of the end game game mode using the sprayer class.
Destroy 25 enemies with a single use of the power ability.
Collect every type of power up in a single game.
Activate an ability 60 times in a single game.
Survive a boss wave in the waves game mode without moving.
Travel through water, lava, acid, and ice in a single game.
Lose all your health from standing on lava or acid for too long.
Revive 2 times in a single game.
Die within the first 10 seconds of a game.
Find a hidden health power up.
